meanings.definition: Descended from a single ancestral line.
meanings.sent1: The monogenetic family tree traced back to one common ancestor.
meanings.sent2: The monogenetic trait of blue eyes ran in the family for generations.
meanings.sent3: It was a monogenetic reunion, with all relatives sharing the same distinctive nose.
meanings.sent4: The monogenetic bond between siblings was unbreakable, like roots of a tree.
meanings.sent5: The monogenetic heritage was evident in their similar features and mannerisms.

meanings.definition: Produced by a single process or event.
meanings.sent1: The monogenetic eruption formed a new volcano in the landscape.
meanings.sent2: The monogenetic crystal was created in the intense heat of the volcano.
meanings.sent3: The monogenetic explosion startled the villagers but left a beautiful crater.
meanings.sent4: Her monogenetic idea sparked a chain reaction of creativity in the team.
meanings.sent5: The monogenetic origin of the gemstone made it unique and valuable.
